resources.string:
ABOUT BALANCE TRANSFER
  • You can transfer balance from Rs. 10 up to Rs. 200 only per transfer.
  • You cannot transfer balance from one carrier network to another.
  • The service charge for the balance transfer is Rs. 1(excluding taxes) in Ncell.
  • You can only transfer balance up to 3 times a day.
  • The validity date of receiving mobile is not increased with transfer.

ABOUT NCELL SAPATI
  • The main balance should be less than Rs. 5.
  • Charge : Loan amount(Rs. 40) + Rs. 2(exclusive of taxes)
  • The subscriber should have used the SIM for more than 15 days.
  • Previous sapati(if taken) must be cleared.

ABOUT MY5 SERVICE
  • It allows you to make calls to 5 different Ncell numbers in discounted price.
  • Tariff : 99 paisa/min(Rs. 1.29/min with tax)
  • Charge : Rs. 25.54/month
  • For one month trial, dial 5588.

ABOUT MISSED CALL NOTIFICATION
  • There is no activation charge to enable this service.
  • You will receive SMS about the calls that you missed when you were outside the network coverage, enable flight mode or switch off the phone.

ABOUT PRBT SERVICE
  • It replaces the boring callback tone with your favourite music or tune.
  • PRBT service charge : Rs. 10 monthly
  • PRBT tone charge : Rs. 10 monthly

ABOUT LOW BALANCE CALL
  • It is a call service for user having low or zero balance.
  • The balance will be deducted from the receiver\'s side.
  • The receiver is played a voice message and need to press 1 to accept the call.
Please enter recipient\'s 10 digits Ncell phone number.
Please enter amount(in Rs.) between 10 and 200.
